data.title: Caractère de Cochon
data.meta_description: Cooked and cured hams from just about every region in France and as far as the eye can see.
data.meta_site_name: PARIS BY MOUTH | Where to eat in Paris
data.text:
The only shop of its kind in Paris, Caractère de Cochon is devoted entirely to ham. The closet-like space is filled with every kind of cooked and cured hams from various countries and just about every region in France with a variety of pâtés, terrines and antipasti and sausages for good measure. Excellent jambon beurre sandwiches are available mid-day with your pick of hams for only 5€.

An Absolute Favorite

Practical information

Address: 42 rue Charlot, 75003

Nearest transport: Filles du Calvaire (8)

Hours: Closed Monday. Open Tuesday- Saturday from 10am-3pm and 5-8pm; Open Sunday 10am-2pm
